Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory897.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Cradle greets her guests with an elegant smile and a courteous bow.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "Since you've come all this way to find me, there must be something you wish to discuss?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: 'How did you know... that we came specifically to find you?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'I can read your memories to a certain extent—any M.I.N.D. susceptible to the Punishing Virus is accessible to me.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "So you have difficulty accessing Lee and Commandant's memories?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{3: "Following Lucia's signal, Lee takes several steps back with you, ensuring you're now far enough that no one can overhear your conversation."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Observing this, Cradle merely gives a slight smile before turning to face Luna.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cradle', 3: "Now then, let's get to the point. What do you want?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Help me merge with the Red Tide, rebuild my frame within it, and reclaim my power.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'This will add Hetero-Creature components to your body. Are you sure?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I will turn all of it into my strength.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Are you sure you can return from the Red Tide with your consciousness intact?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'This is not your concern.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'What could you offer me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'You already know that.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "I'd agree to this deal if it were anyone else, but you... surely you've got more to offer, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: '...What do you mean?', 4: '2'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{3: 'You lower your voice amid their strained negotiations.'}
{2: 'It seems Luna is also in an unstable state due to the Ascension-Network fluctuations she mentioned.', 3: '44'}
{2: "She seeks to harness Cradle's power...", 3: '46'}
{2: 'Could she be trying to do what Lamia mentioned earlier?', 3: '47'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Are you referring to the egg she mentioned at the seaside?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "We can't rule out that possibility.", 4: '1'}
{2: "This is our chance. We'll wait until their deal is done.", 3: '51'}
{2: "Once Luna turns her attention to the Inver-Hetero Tower, we'll strike at Cradle.", 3: '52'}
{2: "It's too dangerous to keep a Hetero-Creature that can control the Red Tide alive.", 3: '53'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Fine, but what if... their deal doesn't go through?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee glances at the nearby agent and humanoid Hetero-Creature, only to find their eyes already fixed on him.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cradle', 3: "You've brought an even better gift along. How about you hand over that human as well?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Of course not...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Three unexpected figures emerge hastily from the thick fog.'}
{3: "Among the Ascendants stands a familiar figure from the Egret squad—it's Teasell."}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'Ah, you must be the Gray Raven Commandant. Nice to meet you.', 4: '1'}
{2: '...', 3: '73', 4: '(Signal Gray Raven to wait and observe)', 5: '73'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: "I've come to fulfill what Mister previously discussed with you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lithos turns around to face Luna.'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'Let me pay the remaining price.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Left? Where to?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Cradle approaches Lithos with curiosity, studying him intently.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "It's as if pages have been torn from your memories. You have no answers to any questions about me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: "Is that so... Before I came here, I did something Mister had asked of me a long time ago. If I've lost some memories because of that, they must not have been important.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'You want to help pay the price? Why?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'Because... Mister has already left us.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lithos takes a step toward Luna and bows slightly, extending his "pledge of loyalty" with deliberately exposed vulnerability.'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'Please, accept the three of us as your subordinates.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lithos', 3: "She took Mister's belongings and left to pursue her own goals.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "Oh? Then why didn't you follow her?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lithos', 3: 'Given her personality... she wouldn\'t accept someone as "boring" as me.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'Are you truly Lithos right now?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory897.jpg'}
{3: "In the next instant, Alpha's blade is at Lithos' neck. If Voodoo hadn't just managed to intervene, Lithos would have been reduced to a lifeless corpse."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lithos', 3: 'Before you kill me, may I ask you a question?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'If you could go back in time, would you kill me before I met Ravenge?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The boy holds his offering pose, letting vital fluid trickle down his neck.'}
{2: 'α', 3: "He wasn't your only victim.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: "...Do you really think that without me, Ravenge and everyone else would've made it and found their happy ending?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: "My only task is to deliver this bargaining chip to Miss Luna. Whether I survive after that doesn't matter.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: "Like you, I'm ready for the end. But before that comes, I just need a few more days to find my only living family.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Your only living family?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: 'Yes, I only recently heard news about her...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: "If Miss Luna grants me these few days, I'm willing to give up everything I've accumulated over the years.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lithos', 3: "As your Ascendant, you'll be able to sense my location at all times. You can end my life whenever you wish.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "You'll get your answer once I come out of the Inver-Hetero Tower.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Lithos nods, his neck brushing against Alpha's sword blade as he steps forward, handing something over to Luna."}
{3: 'Alpha quickly sheathes her katana with a look of disgust, as if she had just scraped the blade against rotting flesh.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: '...Now then, is this bargaining chip sufficient?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Cradle looks at the gathered crowd before her and nods with a smile.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Now, I no longer have the right to refuse.', 4: '1'}
{3: '—But she still has the right to flee and watch from afar.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Cradle takes the data chip from Luna's hand and bows her head, placing it in her mouth."}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: '...I see now, Agent Zero...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She turns toward the Inver-Hetero Tower and gives a slow nod.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'It seems our goals align, Agent Luna.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Come with me. I will help you... rebuild your frame within the Red Tide.', 4: '1'}
